mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(EMAIL, NAME, PASSWORD, PROFILE_IMG, ENROLL_DATE) VALUES(#{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{profile_img}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME = #{name}, PASSWORD = #{password}, PROFILE_IMG = #{profile_img}, LOCATION = #{location}, SHORTDESCRIPTION = #{shortDescription}, HOMEPAGE = #{homepage}, PHONE1 = #{phone1}, PHONE2 = #{phone2}, PHONE3 = #{phone3} WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
